de.kaleidox.vban

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kaleidox.vban.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of Utility methods for the VBAN API.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Util() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] appendByteArray(byte[] ba1, byte... ba2)
      Creates a new byte-array with the length of ba1.length + ba2.length, which will be filled with all bytes of ba1 and ba2 in order, and then returns the new array.
      static byte[] createByteArray(java.lang.Object data)
      Converts an object into a byte-array.
      static byte[] intToByteArray(int integer, int size)
      Converts the given integer into a byte-array of the given size.
      static byte[] stringToBytesASCII(java.lang.String str)
      Creates an ASCII conform byte-array from the given String.
      static byte[] trimArray(byte[] base, int size)
      Trims the base array to the given size, filling with nulls if necessary.

    • Method Detail

      • stringToBytesASCII

        public static byte[] stringToBytesASCII(java.lang.String str)
        Creates an ASCII conform byte-array from the given String.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to convert.
        Returns:
        A byte-array that contains the ASCII mappings of the given String.

      • appendByteArray

        public static byte[] appendByteArray(byte[] ba1,
                                     byte... ba2)
        Creates a new byte-array with the length of ba1.length + ba2.length, which will be filled with all bytes of ba1 and ba2 in order, and then returns the new array.
        Parameters:
        ba1 - The first, base byte-array.
        ba2 - The bytes to be appended.
        Returns:
        The new, larger byte-array.

      • trimArray

        public static byte[] trimArray(byte[] base,
                               int size)
        Trims the base array to the given size, filling with nulls if necessary.
        Parameters:
        base - The base array.
        size - The desired size.
        Returns:
        The new, resized array.

      • intToByteArray

        public static byte[] intToByteArray(int integer,
                                    int size)
        Converts the given integer into a byte-array of the given size.
        Parameters:
        integer - The integer to convert.
        size - The desired size of the array.
        Returns:
        The new byte-array.

      • createByteArray

        public static byte[] createByteArray(java.lang.Object data)
        Converts an object into a byte-array. Used by VBAN.sendData(Object).
        Parameters:
        data - The object to convert.
        Returns:
        The byte-array that has been converted out.
